name: Air Fryer Honey Garlic Meatballs
preparation:
1. Preheat air fryer to 400° F.
  2. Meanwhile, in a large bowl, using a fork, combine beef and 2 tbsp seasoning. Form into 16 meatballs (about a scant 2 tbsp each).
  3. Arrange meatballs in a single layer in air fryer basket.
  4. Cook 10 min, shaking basket halfway through.
  5. Meanwhile, in Round Steamer, whisk together remaining seasoning, water, and honey. Microwave uncovered on high 2 min, whisking halfway through. If not thickened to your liking after 2 min, cook for additional 30 sec intervals, whisking after each interval, until desired thickness is achieved.
  6. Once cooked, remove meatballs from basket using tongs. Add to steamer with sauce; stir to coat.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1⁄2 cup rice and 1 cup steamed vegetables.
